text:
In the ritzy Bel-Air district of Los Angeles comes a tale of two megamansions: A massive spec home coming to market for $180 million sits right next door to another massive spec home already asking $188 million.

Both properties are aspiring to become the most expensive home ever sold in the United States. The current record holder is a sprawling estate in the Hamptons that sold for $137 million to hedge fund manager Barry Rosenstein in 2014.

...
title: Bel-Air Homes Duel to Become America’s Most Expensive
